name: agent_score
description: Instant agent score 0-100. Fastest and cheapest way to evaluate any AI agent. Triggers: agent score, rate agent, agent rating, quick check, evaluate agent, agent quality. Returns single score with breakdown. Pass agent_id. 0.05 USDC.

agent_id.description: Agent ID (numeric from agdp.io/agent/YOUR_ID) or agent name.
